name: Geo Phone Master
author: Vitaly Mironov

sections.description:
Geo Phone Master – Geotargeting and Multicity.
The plugin is designed to allow the user to receive data depending on their geographical location.
For example, display the phone on the site depending on the city, region, or city.
Also has a multi function town, in order to allow the user to enter the desired subdomain site.

License

sections.installation:
1. Upload nor1m-geo-phone-master.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unpack the archive
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Use
